title: Friday the 13th Special Live Stream
author: MaryGirl Moody
comment:
Hey MaryGirl. I totally agree with you. The 60's, 70's and 80's are really the high water mark horror wise. There was sooo much stuff coming out that was awesome quality wise ;)!. 

Also, i don't really have bad friday the 13th experience. The 3 scariest horror movies for me are: 1. The Shining, 2. The Excorcist & 3. Videodrome.
How do I get those pics of all the Friday the 13th the Series to you?
description:
It's Friday the 13th and let's talk about our most scary experiences and the actual movies, even the ratchet ones.
